page.title: 02FIFARM NURS-ETTE
page.content: {Fifarm}is situated in{Cupar Muir,}has been running{12 years}and specialises in animal rearing.It makes replacement milk for many kinds of animals.Nurs_ Ette manufactures an{automatic animal {feeder}and is the only firm outside the{USA}to produce this machine.The machine provides 1 pint milk at a time and the animal will drink its fill.The advantages of this machine are that the animal is feeding in its{natural {position}and it is{labour saving.}In this form,the milk is guaranteed for 1 year as the vitamins rot,though the milk itself can last 5 years.The machines and milk are sold from the {north of Scotland}to as far south as {Leeds.}Nurs_Ette have now started selling whole sale foods and are expected to have a good future.
